general.description:
I am an internationally experienced, industry versatile business professional, who is a strong and proactive individual, who shows initiative and is capable of solving problems, making decisions and setting priorities in short timeframes. I am self motivated and approach my work with enthusiasm and have a strong customer service ethos. I find my energetic attitude towards my work promotes motivation within my teams, therefore achieving goals and resolving issues, which actively invokes confidence to customers at all management levels especially when dealing with third party suppliers.

I have significant experience turning around failing operations and improving business practices. I have provided thought leadership, direction and strategic advisory consultancy to a wide range of industries.

I am flexible, work well under pressure and I am able to meet challenging deadlines. I keep abreast of ICT product development, which is vital in the ever evolving ICT business world. I have excellent oral and written communications skills and have a flexible approach to my work frequently working outside of normal operational hours due to changing deadlines, workload and customer requirements. My constant desire to learn allows me to continuously improve my approach towards delivery. I am extremely competent in Agile with Scrum, Prince 2, MSP and ITIL and use these tools as required in the delivery of my duties.

In my roles I have gained considerable people management experience and have managed teams of people in a matrix management framework across the business including third parties, desktop, infrastructure and applications support and development to deliver complex and highly strategic solutions to deadlines. I have full P&L experience and ownership responsibility and understand all aspects of operational and business financial requirements. I mainly operate with board level customers and internal personnel in the delivery of my work.

general.headline: Working with Brisbane's best Digital talent. Contact me on 0450 551 511.
general.description:
I am a passionate recruiter, with a focus in the UX & Product space & pride myself in attracting & working with the best talent in town.  

What gets me up in the morning? Helping people. I am a 'career-mapper' for the candidates I work with & a 'solution-seeker' for the clients I partner with. I manage the process of securing hard-to-find talent for my clients in a candidate-short market & balance this with a first-class candidate experience. 

Why me? - I have a degree in Psychology, complemented by my avid interest in people & their aspirations. My insatiable appetite to understand human behaviour is mirrored by my fascination with online user behaviour, hence why User Experience & Product are my jam! 

The stats: 70% of the candidates I work with are passive, & I fill 100% of exclusive roles I work on. So committed to the candidate experience, I have an NPS of 84, three times above the industry. 

What else: I am the create & owner of the u&u Digital Breakfast MeetUp which is a community of digital operators who come together to hear about topics by experts in their field. We talk disruptive digital trends on areas such as emerging tech, product development, Agile transformation, design thinking, UX, CX, AI,  AR, & VR & all other associated acronyms. I am also a regular sponsor of Brisbane’s Product Tank. 

My side hustle: I teach yoga to stressed out corporates so beware, I may start aligning your chakras at any time. I am also one u&u's 'Holistic Health Hustlers’ helping enrich the mind, body & soul in the workplace. 

In short, I love to work with people to help us all be better versions of ourselves, career-wise or otherwise so please reach out at any time on 0450 551 511 or Sophia.philippou@uandu.com 
                                   
Roles: 
Product Owner & Product Manager 
Digital Strategy 
Digital Project Manager
Digital Producer 
Head of Digital / Digital Director
UX / UI Design 
Digital & Graphic Design
CX & Service Design

jobs.description:
u&u is a recruitment partnership of hand selected experienced consultants committed to achieving exceptional results for both our clients and our candidates. With offices in Queensland and New South Wales, u&u is a highly awarded firm who has most recently been recognised by BRW as one of Australia's top 50 growth organisations. 

As the digital recruitment specialist here at u&u I specialise in the following areas: 

Product Owner and product Manager 
Digital Strategy 
Digital Project Manager / Digital Producer 
Head of Digital / Digital Director

UX / UI Designer 
Product Design
CX and Service Designer 
Digital and Graphic Designer 
 
Interested to learn more? Visit us at www.uandu.com or call me on 0450 551 511.

As a recruitment consultant at AccountAbility / Ambition I specialised in placing temporary or contract candidates. Having graduated in the UK in 2007 with a degree in Psychology I came to Australia to travel and build on my experience and business relationships. With over 7 years’ experience in sales and customer service and my expertise in salary packaging my unique experience and background ensures I am at the fore-front of the recruitment game. 

Due to my commitment to quality service and my keen interest in building relationships I have a strong understanding of both our candidates’ and clients’ requirements alike. I work with exclusive candidates and by partnering with clients I can assist them with not only quality passive candidates but market knowledge and advice on recruitment strategies.

Data#3 Limited (DTL) is an ASX listed company that provides market-leading business technology solutions in a Hybrid IT environment from on-premise to outsourced to cloud across a wide range of industries throughout Australia and Asia Pacific. Headquartered in Brisbane, we have offices, data centres, and configuration and warehousing facilities in operation across Australia.

As the only specialist IT Recruitment and Workforce Services agency that’s fully embedded within an Australian business technology company, we have an in-depth understanding of the technical skills and competencies you need to get the full value from your technology investment.

Pursuing the Brisbane technology sector, I talent search for both temporary contract and permanent roles, which consist of the following positions: 

- IT Manager | Network & Systems Administration | Helpdesk Support 

- Database Administrator | Database Developer | BI Developer | Data Analyst 

- Software Developer | Web Developer | Digital Developer | Test Analyst

general.headline: Director at Emanate Technology
general.description:
Specialising in the recruitment of Data and Analytics, Project Services and Senior Technology Leaders across the Commercial and NFP sectors in Queensland.

Having been in the IT recruitment industry across three states since the late 20th century and experiencing the highs and lows of the economy over that time, I have a great passion for working in partnership with technology professionals across a breadth of market conditions.

What will you get by partnering with Emanate Technology?  A professional and consultative recruitment service for our clients and candidates.  We aim to provide advice on the outcomes we feel is the best solution for you, not the one that we think you want to hear.  

Partnership is one of our core values, we define partnership as being built on communication, trust and respect. We value our own time, as well as that of all people we do business with. We do what we say we are going to do and place a large emphasis on communication throughout any recruitment process or assignment. For us, to provide a quality service we choose to work with people that appreciate it.

The last business my own family ran (as Butchers), spanned 3 generations and over 100 years in Hobart. It was an extremely different industry sector to the one I am part of today, but the ultimate objective is still the same, serve your customers well.

For more information, please also visit us at emanatetechnology.com.au

jobs.description:
Based in Brisbane, I specialise in the end-to-end recruitment of permanent and contract technology professionals specialising in the following:

- Data and Analytics
- Project Services
- Technology Leaders

Emanate Technology have identified a gap in the technology recruitment market for a high touch, consultative and specialist service – it is both our opportunity and objective to provide this.

We’re not a transactional recruitment firm. We only work with clients that see the value in the service we provide and are prepared to partner with us in attracting and securing the best talent available. Candidates are the lifeblood of our business, without them there are no clients.

At Emanate Technology we take the time to understand our candidates skills and motivations and coach them throughout the recruitment process to best prepare them for a successful outcome.

We pride ourselves on professionalism and integrity but don’t underestimate the need to have FUN in our dealings with clients and candidates – it’s part of our personality.

general.headline: Director | Program Manager | Project Manager | Solution Delivery Manager
general.description:
Project Director and Delivery Manager with technical and commercial backgrounds and a focus on business outcomes and enablement. Senior Project Manager with extensive experience managing projects from business case development to successful operational transition and closure.

Track record of success in Private and Government sectors, negotiating outcomes and managing competing priorities. Able to communicate with stakeholders at all levels and lead diverse teams, respecting the contributions of all parties. 

Strengths include:
- Demonstrable experience in managing Infrastructure and Software development projects. 
- External vendor, contract and partnership management and procurement
- Experience in P&L responsibility, forecasting, and financial management of multi-million dollar project and operational budgets
- Stakeholder management and engagement (including Executive level) 
- Ability to communicate with all stakeholders and multi-disciplinary teams, with a technical background in solution architecture, systems and application programming, networking, system administration and Information Technology facilities management

jobs.description:
Account management and oversight for major accounts; providing a single point of contact for clients, project assurance, and an escalation point for clients and consultants.

E&E deliver projects using both Waterfall (PRINCE2) and Agile (Scrum) project management principles according to client requirements.

Clients included Queensland Health, BHP, Virgin Australia, RACQ and University of Queensland.

jobs.jobTitle: Director - Consulting Services - Project Management SME
jobs.description:
Negotiation  of $58.8M contract for implementation CGI's Collection360 product for Queensland Treasury (SPER), and ongoing provision of the solution as a cloud-based service for 10 years.

As Engagement Director, I managed the contract and implementation of the SPER Collections program of work; including Cloud based infrastructure, integration, business process re-engineering, subcontract management and business transformation. 

CGI's representative on Queensland Rail's project board, responsible for delivery of all ICT infrastructure projects and work packages CGI performs as part of Queensland Rail’s ongoing ICT portfolio (including storage, compute, device deployments, SOE management, network and security projects). CGI is Queensland Rail’s managed service provider for infrastructure.

Creation and negotiation of proposals for CGI clients.

Responsible for the P&L and delivery of all client engagements and Delivery Team capability on a national basis.

	Project Management for selected major fixed price engagements for critical accounts
	Increased revenue from $50K/month to $1.2M/month, generating repeat business from increased customer satisfaction
	Built partner and vendor relationships to increase functional and on-demand capacity increase capability.
	Review and approval of all proposals, commercial arrangements and commitments.
	Governance and oversight of commercials and deliverables for work delivered by partners and external contractors.
	Projects included custom development, Business intelligence, collaboration platforms, EDRMS, mobile applications, web-based applications, case management systems, risk management systems, and business process automation. 

I also worked with a number of clients to define and execute rolling 5 year IT strategic plans, identifying opportunities for efficiency gains and capability enhancement.
 
I also managed the development of packaged products using SharePoint to provide analytics and reporting for the Education sector.

Management of all projects and support agreements for the QLD branch. These projects were primarily Internet, Intranet and Extranet portals and Website development; Enterprise Information Systems, CRM, and EDRMS engagements, with a budget range of $50K to $1M. 
Co-ordination and resource management of the 20 consultants in the branch and external vendors to deliver services and maximise billable utilisation. 
Performed duties and responsibilities of the Queensland Service Delivery/Branch Manager when required, and project management of two major releases of OBS's i5 records management product using Agile methodologies.

jobs.companyName: Department of Housing and Public Works (Queensland)
jobs.description:
Definition of the Department’s strategy for current and future deployment of mobile IT technologies and video conferencing, including technical solution and cost recovery models. This strategy included options and consideration for cost effectiveness and efficiency gains, and increasing services and capability for front line services (eg. online and mobile occupational therapy and property inspection). 

Management of a program of work to implement the strategy, including technology evaluation, procurement, software redevelopment, mobile device deployment, and handover to operations.

Management of multiple projects for Government and Corporate clients. 
Clients included Rio Tinto, Newcrest Mining, QLD Department of Natural Resources and Water, Firepro Engineering.

Project budgets ranged from $50K to $6.5M.

general.headline: Account Director at ASG Group
general.description:
Glenn is a highly skilled people leader and innovative Business Development and Account Director with strong communication and rapport-building skills. With over 20 years’ experience across all aspects of the project lifecycle - from early inception and thought leadership to implementation, delivery and managed services, Glenn consistently delivers exceptional outcomes for clients across a range of industries, cultures and technologies. With an excellent track record in leading the delivery of both Agile driven software projects and large scale traditional programs of work, Glenn utilises a broad range of delivery methodologies.

Glenn has a proven reputation for ‘getting things done’ and engendering project/team success in an engaging way by:

- A unique, warm and supportive approach to people engagement and leadership that rapidly builds rapport, trust and high-performing multi-skilled teams.
- Distilling complex information into a simple and easily understandable format.
- Utilising various methodologies and techniques in a lean and pragmatic manner to ensure long-term adoption and take-up.

My background has included specific training in HR related courses with the Australian Institute of Management and more recently Prince2 project management certification. I am a member of FIT (Females in Technology) and ITCRA (Information Technology Contract Recruitment Association). My work ethic and attention to detail is second to none and I have an exceptional customer service focus. This is demonstrated through my successful track record of supplying permanent and contract personnel to many organistions in the finance, healthcare, consulting and government sectors.

general.headline:
Recruitment Consultant at Paxus - Technology & Digital Talent
07 3339 5623
general.description:
Summary:
Over the years I have been working within various industries in Australia and New Zealand including Telecommunications, Office Supplies, Finance and now Recruitment.  The roles I have held include: Sales Consultant, Office Manager, Account Manager, PA / Sales Support and more recently Recruitment Consultant.  With the valuable skills, experience and knowledge which I have developed and gained over the years it is helping me identify and match the needs and requirements of Clients and Candidates.

jobs.description:
Paxus is a leading technology and digital talent specialist, with a genuine dedication to candidate, contractor and client service. With operations spanning Australia and New Zealand, we connect thousands of talented people with great jobs every year, providing rewarding opportunities in the best organisations.

We partner with our clients across the country to co-design creative and agile sourcing strategies, to attract skilled talent locally, and rare talent from across the globe. Candidates come to us because they know we will do everything we can to help them land their dream job - and our contractors are loyal because their dedicated Contractor Care Consultant makes doing business easy.

We pride ourselves on operating with the highest ethical standards, and advocate diversity in the workplace. We are proud to be a founding member of APSCo - an association dedicated to maintaining an industry-specific ethical code of conduct. We also support Females in IT and Telecommunications, the Australian Network on Disability, and the Project Management Institute.

Paxus is quality certified in Australia to ISO9001:2015, demonstrating the implementation of best practice to deliver quality outcomes for our clients, contractors and candidates. To view a copy of our Quality Policy, please click here.

Paxus is a division of Adcorp – South Africa’s largest workforce solutions company.

At Cavanagh & Associates we specialise in Office Support recruitment – placing
      
      temporary, permanent and contract positions.

general.headline: Owner and Director at JJP Talent Solutions - IT & Digital Recruitment - 0499 773546
general.description:
I am a hands on recruitment business owner and director with extensive IT and digital recruitment experience.  I manage all stages of the recruitment process (business development, candidate sourcing, placement, rate/ salary negotiation etc) together with the responsibilities of owning a business.

I pride myself on my honest and empathetic approach which is proven by the fact that both clients and candidates consistently return to utilise my expertise. I have a genuine passion for recruitment and appreciate how my services can positively change the lives of both candidates and clients.

My approach is to "treat people the way that you would wish to be treated" hence my professional, thorough and understanding approach to candidates and clients.  I also believe that life is too short to be serious all the time so I aim to be a recruiter who is easy to deal with and who has a sense a fun!

If you are looking for either a high calibre IT expert or for an exciting career opportunity or simply want to know more about the IT marketplace, please contact me on 0499 773 546 for a confidential discussion.

jobs.jobTitle: Owner and Director - IT and Digital Recruitment Consultancy
jobs.description:
I am the Owner and Director of JJP Talent Solutions, a specialist IT and Digital Recruitment Consultancy based in Brisbane.  We focus on providing a tailored and transparent service to both clients and candidates.  We have the ability to find unique candidates and work with many clients on an exclusive basis so can offer candidates roles which are not on the open market.  The philosophy of JJP Talent Solutions is to "treat people the way that you would like to be treated".   We are focused on developing long term relationships which both clients and candidates. 

I have extensive experience of recruiting software developers/ engineers in a variety of technologies including .Net C#, Java, PHP, Python, Ruby, C++ and JavaScript languages such as Angular.JS, ReactJS and Node.JS. I have proven expertise in the Mobile Application Development arena with technologies such as iOS, Android and Xamarin. A more recent area of experience is Functional Programming such as Scala, Haskell and Clojure.

My knowledge and networks encompass many other IT skill sets including:

• Web Developers/ Designers
• SharePoint Developers and Administrators
• Front End Developers
• UI/ UX/ CX Specialists
• Systems/ Automation Testers and Test Managers
• Architects – Solution/ Enterprise/ Technical/ Data
• Business Intelligence/ Data Warehousing/ Data Analysts
• Business Analysts
• Project Managers/ Project Co-ordinators
• Product Owners/ Managers
• Scrum Masters/ Iteration Managers
• Change Managers/ Organisational Change Managers
• Security Specialists
• Infrastructure/ Systems/ Network Specialists and Systems Administrators 
• IT Trainers/ Tutors/ Technical Writers/ Instructional Designers
• Senior roles – Software Engineering Managers, Infrastructure Managers, IT Managers, CTOs

NatRec is a network of Recruitment Partners and Associates currently operating in Qld, Vic, NSW and WA.  NatRec's message is simple... Yours. Together.  

I joined NatRec as a Recruitment Associate.  In March 2018, after achieving various goals, I become a Recruitment Partner.  I am now a Member of the NatRec Network and the Director of JJP Talent Solutions Pty Ltd.   NatRec provides a range of back-office services to JJP Talent Solutions so that I can focus on what I do best - recruiting high calibre talent for fantastic companies!

Established in 1994, M&T Resources is a division of SMS Management & Technology (ASX:SMX); Australia's leading Consulting, Technology and Systems Integration Services company.  M&T Resources recruits talented permanent and contract candidates and works in partnership with high calibre organisations to assist them in managing the full recruitment lifecycle. 

In my role as IT Recruitment Account Manager, I focused on sourcing high calibre permanent candidates for a variety of organisations, many of which were entirely new to M&T.  I worked across a diverse range of skillsets including Software Testers, Enterprise and Solution Architects, UX Specialists, Software Developers and Infrastructure Specialists.  One of my achievements was conducting a series of exclusive retained searches for a leading financial organisation where I successfully placed 7 senior IT Managers.

jobs.jobTitle: Connections Partner/ Senior IT Recruitment Consultant
jobs.description:
Exclaim IT is a Brisbane based IT recruitment consultancy.  During my time with Exclaim IT, I developed meaningful client and candidate connections in the permanent and contract IT marketplace across Australia. 

My role involved new business development and account management through regular client meetings and industry events.  I also attracted and interviewed high calibre candidates through referrals, advertising, social media and networking events to deliver effective recruitment solutions.

My most significant achievement in 2014 was sourcing over 110 high calibre employees for a growing organisation in Australia.  The roles were in a variety of specialisms across several different states including QLD, NSW, VIC, ACT and SA.

jobs.jobTitle: Senior IT Recruitment Consultant - Technology - Software
jobs.description:
Ambition is a global recruitment business operating in a select number of specialist areas including Information Technology, Banking & Financial Services and Finance & Accounting.  Ambition acquired Witan Jardine (an organisation I worked for in London before founding Morgan Steel) so it seemed a natural move to join the organisation in Brisbane.

I specialised in recruiting software development and software testing experts with skills in .Net, C#, Sharepoint, Java, Javascript, HTML5, PHP and C++ together with mobile application development including iOS and Android. I also developed my knowledge of Functional Programming such as Haskell, F#, Scala, OCaml and Erlang.

I owned and managed this recruitment consultancy which specialised in permanent IT recruitment, mainly software developers, software engineers, software testers and project managers as well as technical support.  My clients included SME’s and large multinationals.

My main areas of specialism were .Net, C#, Java and C/C++.  For the past few years, I focussed on the Mobile Apps arena, recruiting Developers (iOS, Android, Blackberry) as well as Mobile Project Managers and Testers.

One of the key highlights during this time was the recruitment of an entire Research and Development (R&D) team of over 50 software developers, testers and project managers for a dynamic mobile start-up.  In 2011, this start-up was acquired by a leading global organisation which the founder and CTO stated was as a direct result of the hires I sourced for the company.  

I made the decision to move to Brisbane in 2012.  The geographical distance and time difference made it impossible to offer the level of service I wished to provide to clients and candidates.  As a result, Morgan Steel has ceased trading.

I worked both as a recruitment consultant specialising in recruiting back and middle
      office candidates into leading investment banks and financial institutions and also as
      
      an Internal Recruiter and Recruitment Trainer/ Coach.

Elan is a global IT recruitment specialist.  I mainly specialised in recruiting permanent
      software developers and software engineers with C/C++ skills.  For the last two years
      at Elan, I set up and developed a team which recruited a variety of IT candidates into
      
      investment banks.

general.description:
HR professional with over 6 years of experience in end-to-end talent acquisition and talent

jobs.description:
EY (previously Ernst & Young) are committed to building a better working world – one with increased trust and confidence in business, sustainable growth, development of talent, and greater collaboration.

My current role involves the proactive sourcing and engagement of candidates for strategic roles within EY. I look after hiring for the FSO Advisory teams across Oceania. 

Our purpose is to promote EY’s employer brand and career opportunities to the candidate market to support our Vision 2020 strategy of being the leading global professional services organisation and building the highest performing teams.

Our talent pooling efforts are broadly aligned to our strategic priorities, growth areas and big bets, and we are able to deliver tailored sourcing campaigns to ensure we are attracting candidates from diverse backgrounds. 

We use a variety of online tools and advanced searching techniques to access untapped talent, and our in-depth service line knowledge and passion for EY allows us to effectively engage with the external candidate market.

Swati specialises in resourcing for the IT recruitment practice at u&u in Brisbane, working across all verticals in IT, and sourcing specialised candidates for contract and permanent roles, for both public and private sector clients.

As a qualified computer science engineer, Swati has an eye for matching technology skills to her clients’ requirements.
